languages.text: "Как скажете, Ваша Светлость. Человек, выдающий себя за лорда Моллеса, признан виновным в намеренном введении в заблуждение семьи Моллес и в присвоении личности дворянина. Наказание: казнь".

"As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man claiming to be Lord Molles has been found guilty of deliberately misleading the Molles family and of appropriating the identity of a nobleman. His punishment is death."
languages.original_text: "Как скажете, Ваша Светлость. Человек, выдающий себя за лорда Моллеса, признан виновным в намеренном введении в заблуждение семьи Моллес и в присвоении личности дворянина. Наказание: казнь".

traits.locale_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man claiming to be Lord Molles has been found guilty of deliberately misleading the Molles family and of appropriating the identity of a nobleman. His punishment is death."

"As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man claiming to be Lord Molles has been found guilty of deliberately misleading the Molles family and of appropriating the identity of a nobleman. His punishment is death."

"As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man claiming to be Lord Molles has been found guilty of deliberately misleading the Molles family and of appropriating the identity of a nobleman. His punishment is death."

"As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man claiming to be Lord Molles has been found guilty of deliberately misleading the Molles family and of appropriating the identity of a nobleman. His punishment is death."

"As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man claiming to be Lord Molles has been found guilty of deliberately misleading the Molles family and of appropriating the identity of a nobleman. His punishment is death."

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Mann, der behauptet, Lord Molles zu sein, wurde für schuldig befunden, die Familie Molles absichtlich getäuscht und die Identität eines Adligen angenommen zu haben. Seine Strafe lautet Tod."
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man claiming to be Lord Molles has been found guilty of deliberately misleading the Molles family and of appropriating the identity of a nobleman. His punishment is death."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Mann, der behauptet, Lord Molles zu sein, wurde für schuldig befunden, die Familie Molles absichtlich getäuscht und die Identität eines Adligen angenommen zu haben. Seine Strafe lautet Tod."

languages.text: « Comme il vous plaira, Votre Seigneurie. L'homme qui se fait passer pour le seigneur Molles est déclaré coupable d'avoir délibérément trompé la famille Molles en usurpant l'identité d'un noble. Ce crime sera puni par la mort. »
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man claiming to be Lord Molles has been found guilty of deliberately misleading the Molles family and of appropriating the identity of a nobleman. His punishment is death."

traits.locale_text: « Comme il vous plaira, Votre Seigneurie. L'homme qui se fait passer pour le seigneur Molles est déclaré coupable d'avoir délibérément trompé la famille Molles en usurpant l'identité d'un noble. Ce crime sera puni par la mort. »

languages.text: “如您所愿，大人。这个自称莫莱斯勋爵的男子犯下了蓄意欺骗莫莱斯家族，妄图窃取贵族身份的罪行，在此判处死刑。”
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man claiming to be Lord Molles has been found guilty of deliberately misleading the Molles family and of appropriating the identity of a nobleman. His punishment is death."

traits.locale_text: “如您所愿，大人。这个自称莫莱斯勋爵的男子犯下了蓄意欺骗莫莱斯家族，妄图窃取贵族身份的罪行，在此判处死刑。”

languages.text: «Como desee, mi{mf|lord|lady}. El hombre que afirmaba ser lord Molles ha sido declarado culpable de engañar deliberadamente la familia Molles y de usurpación de identidad de un noble. Su castigo es la muerte».
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man claiming to be Lord Molles has been found guilty of deliberately misleading the Molles family and of appropriating the identity of a nobleman. His punishment is death."

traits.locale_text: «Como desee, mi{mf|lord|lady}. El hombre que afirmaba ser lord Molles ha sido declarado culpable de engañar deliberadamente la familia Molles y de usurpación de identidad de un noble. Su castigo es la muerte».

languages.text: 「閣下のご意向のままに。モレス公を名乗る男は、モレス家を故意に欺き、貴族の身分を不正に奪った罪で有罪と認められました。彼の刑罰は死刑です」
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man claiming to be Lord Molles has been found guilty of deliberately misleading the Molles family and of appropriating the identity of a nobleman. His punishment is death."

traits.locale_text: 「閣下のご意向のままに。モレス公を名乗る男は、モレス家を故意に欺き、貴族の身分を不正に奪った罪で有罪と認められました。彼の刑罰は死刑です」

languages.text: "Emriniz olur {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kendini Lord Molles olarak tanıtan adam, Molles ailesini kasten aldatmaktan ve bir soylunun kimliğini çalmaktan suçlu bulunmuştur. Cezası ölüm olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man claiming to be Lord Molles has been found guilty of deliberately misleading the Molles family and of appropriating the identity of a nobleman. His punishment is death."

traits.locale_text: "Emriniz olur {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kendini Lord Molles olarak tanıtan adam, Molles ailesini kasten aldatmaktan ve bir soylunun kimliğini çalmaktan suçlu bulunmuştur. Cezası ölüm olacaktır."
